overview: JOKES ON EVERY WRAPPER takes the viewer through a digital rabbit hole of out-of-order processes and vaguely connected objects, spaces, and occurrences. Situated within an interior domestic setting, bizarre acts of home-making and odd everyday events are reflected, shopped, and smashed together. These clips are interrupted by behind-the-scenes views into the DIY construction of these images; the home as a media studio.
title: Jokes on Every Wrapper
